Value: Allows the training of |cffcece00Saboteurs|r in Workshop. They are similar to |cffcece00Brigadiers|r, but with following unique traits: |n|n- Adds 25 movement speed|n|n- Enables the |cffcece00Incendiary Cocktail |rability, which disables repairs on a building and slows it's attack while dealing additional damage over time.|n|n- Enables the |cffcece00Infiltrate|r ability, allowing the Saboteur to enter stealth for 14 seconds after a 2 second delay.
